content:
# The stone furnace has successfully produced a total of 5 iron plates, and it is currently in a working state with 14 units of coal remaining as fuel. 
# The furnace shows no remaining iron ore to process.

# Now, I will extract the 5 iron plates from the furnace inventory to add them to my inventory.

extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, position=furnace_info.position, quantity=5)  # Extract the 5 iron plates from the furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after extraction.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
